definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
to have children/to raise or bring up/to educate

sentences.english: The out-of-wedlock birth rate rose by a sharp 7 percent last year.
sentences.chinese: 未婚生育率较去年上升了整整7%。

sentences.english: China has been a country with low - fertility, which is unstable still.
sentences.chinese: 我国已经是低生育率国家，但低生育水平还不稳定。

sentences.english: The low fertility rate and advanced age-rization make the burden heavier for middle class.
sentences.chinese: 而生育率降低加上高龄化让中产阶级的负担随之增加。

sentences.english: High birth rates were often balanced out by high death rates.
sentences.chinese: 高生育率常被高死亡率抵消。
科索沃人的生育率也在下降。

sentences.english: High fertility rates, along with inadequate health care, impede development and economic growth.
sentences.chinese: 生育率高和保健服务不足会阻碍发展和经济增长。

sentences.english: All the more so for us, as we are a small country with low birth rates.
sentences.chinese: 我们小国寡民，加上生育率偏低，更需要这么做。

sentences.english: Marriage and fertility rates have plunged.
sentences.chinese: 结婚率和生育率已经猛跌。

sentences.english: But in richer countries, the rate has already nosedived.
sentences.chinese: 但在较为富裕的国家，人口生育率已经大幅下滑。

sentences.english: Tunisia now has a birth rate similar to that of France.
sentences.chinese: 突尼斯目前的生育率与法国相仿。

sentences.english: Lag and telescoping are unique feathers of fertility transition in China.
sentences.chinese: 滞后与压缩是我国人口生育率转变独有的特征。

sentences.english: Hong Kong is one of the territories experiencing the lowest-low fertility in the world.
sentences.chinese: 香港是世界上生育率水平最低的超低生育率地区之一。

sentences.english: Hong Kong is one of the territories experiencing the lowest-low fertility in the world.
sentences.chinese: 香港是世界上生育率水平最低的超低生育率地区之一。

sentences.english: The UN projects that the world will reachreplacement fertility by 2030.
sentences.chinese: 联合国预计，到2030年，世界将达到更替生育率。

sentences.english: Out-of- wedlock birth rates have plateaued for blacks.
sentences.chinese: 黑人的未婚生育率已经不再增加。

sentences.english: Double gourds are especially treasured as symbols of fertility.
sentences.chinese: 双葫芦是特别珍贵的生育率作为符号。

definition: to bear/to give birth/to grow/to rear/to bring up (children)/fertility
Gini coefficient (a measure of statistical dispersion)

pinyin: du2 sheng1 zi3 nu:3 zheng4 ce4

definition: percentage of children who enter school
